profile.shortDescription: Product strategy, large-scale crawling, content marketing, building agency, SEO.
profile.longDescription:
I was a high school student when I meet with SEO by creating the first Turkish SEO blog. Then, it turns to be an agency with three offices, and we're working with 60+ talented people. Until today, we have worked with 500+ clients from 10+ countries. (Zeo Agency - zeo.org)

Now, I'm leading a product team to create the world's first data-science backed SEO analytics software, seo.do. As a non-technical product manager, I made many mistakes and learned great lessons to share.

If you are starting a new SEO campaign or trying to build a new product (specifically analytics software), I will be happy to contribute to your journey with my experiences.

All the earnings from Superpeer will be donated to the victims of the earthquake in Izmir, my hometown. 

Thank you to all Superpeer team to make this happen!
